page.description: Set the value of a 32-bit word of the blob.

argument.name: position
argument.description: The position to write the data.

page.discussion: The .POKED() method sets a 32 bit double word at Position in a blob to a value. The first position is 1.The .POKED() method does not change the size of the blob. Use the <BLOB>.RESIZE() method to change the size of a blob.
